it.apice.sapere.node.networking.guestsmngt.impl
Class GuestMessage

java.lang.Object
  it.apice.sapere.node.networking.guestsmngt.impl.GuestMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GuestMessage
extends Object
implements Serializable

Messages exchanged between guests and GuestsHandlerAgent.

In order to provide a better integration with RDF-based part the LSA representation has been modified: now the message delivers a serialized version of the LSA as RDF/XML.

Author:
Michele Morgagni, Paolo Contessi
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

GuestMessage

public GuestMessage(GuestMessageType aType,
                    CompiledLSA<?> lsa,
                    int aSignal,
                    Float[] anOrientation,
                    String aMacAddress)

Creates a new GuestMessage.

Parameters:
aType - The type of the message
lsa - The LSA to be sent
aSignal - The power of the Wi-Fi signal (for a distance estimation)
anOrientation - The values of the orientation sensor
aMacAddress - The macAddress of the mobile device

GuestMessage

public GuestMessage(GuestMessageType aType,
                    LSAid lsaId,
                    String serializedLSA,
                    int aSignal,
                    Float[] anOrientation,
                    String aMacAddress)

Creates a new GuestMessage.

Parameters:
aType - The type of the message
lsaId - The LSA-id of the LSA to be sent
serializedLSA - The RDF/XML String representing the LSA
aSignal - The power of the Wi-Fi signal (for a distance estimation)
anOrientation - The values of the orientation sensor
aMacAddress - The macAddress of the mobile device
